definition: to travel to (a place where duty calls)
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
to go/to visit (e.g. another country)/to attend (a banquet etc)

sentences.english: Last week, Mr Gou himself rushed to Shenzhen to address the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 上周，郭台铭亲赴深圳处理危机。

sentences.english: Recently, the provincial health department deputy director Liao Xinbo rate experts went to consultation.
sentences.chinese: 近日，省卫生厅副厅长廖新波率专家亲赴会诊。

sentences.english: For presenting yourselves on this battlefield.
sentences.chinese: 为了感谢你们能亲赴沙场参战。

definition: to go/to visit (e.g. another country)/to attend (a banquet etc)
to leave for/to proceed towards/to go
ordained or appointed to a post/to benefit from counsel
special appointment/special correspondent/task force/sb dispatched on a mission
make light of traveling a thousand li/go to the trouble of traveling a long distance
